Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:WorkHeavy_00>Hah!<sp:5:0:0> Haaah!<sp:5:0:0> The underpants method in
action!<sp:5:0:0> Muscling up our minds!<sp:5:0:0> Minding
our muscles!<sp:5:0:0> Hmm?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh, you! The master of the underpants
method!<sp:5:0:0> We will be forever in your debt
for showing us how it's done.
<sp:3:0:2:0001>We got to this method by hearing things
wrong...<sp:5:0:0>but did learn that going into the
wild to face danger is key to research.
You taught us that training to fight
monsters in just our underpants is
excellence in action!
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_00>After my own training is complete, I'm
thinking of investigating <clr:0000>the cave under
this cliff<clr:ffff> and testing my own skills.
It seems that monsters have infiltrated
that cave.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure they're <clr:0000>hiding
something<clr:ffff> inside it!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Oh! The master of the underpants
method!<sp:5:0:0> Are you training too?
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Oh! The master of the underpants
method!

You really are the paragon of excellence
in underpantsâ€”day in, day out!<sp:5:0:0> I'm
impressed!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Happy>I plan to shift my focus to <clr:0000>the cave under
the cliff<clr:ffff>!

I think it might be a major den of
monsters.<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure they're <clr:0000>hiding
something<clr:ffff>!
But I have to train my body a lot more
before I march in there.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>I can't say I look forward to the day when
I finally investigate <clr:0000>the cave under the
cliff<clr:ffff> here...
But I think monsters have made it into a
major den, and I know they must be
hiding something.
So, I will train until I have what it takes
to march down there!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Nothing is better than training in the
underpants method on a morning like this!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Nothing is better than training in the
underpants method. The body and mind
can always be stronger!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>When monsters are sleeping, that's when
I like to train. Anything else is a waste
of time!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:SurpriseS_01>The worse the weather is, the more I'm
driven to train myself!

I will not be shaken! I stand on a
foundation of underpants!<sp:5:0:0> Hmm?
